attributes.action: Station Armed Police Unit at the New Eurostar in London to stop terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you may or may not know there is nobody policing Englands Eurostar railways between London and Paris France, Hence the number of illegal immigrants will increase. Also Armed Police Officers will increase a better sense of public safety and with the right to stop and search will make it alot more safer
